title: Datepicker
description: To create full featured multi language datepicker element use this component.

prop.name: required
prop.description: Does input required to fill? Also with function type you can pass function with one argument (fn(value){}) and return Boolean value.

prop.name: multiple
prop.description: Allow user to select multiple options.

prop.name: deleteButton
prop.description: Show delete button next to selected values.

prop.name: dateLibrary
prop.description: Custom Date library instead of default javascript Date class.

event.name: input
event.description: Fired when component request to change value.

note: The display css prop of input is inline-flex, so do not change it to block or ... for custom styles.
You can globally set the dateLibrary prop by setting by Framevuerk.use('date', Date).
Input value can be any types that allow by Date Library as first argument. All output value is Date Library constructor.
For jalaali dates, we highly propose idate npm package.
